description: A deliciously fresh and salty snack with a creamy mushroom dip that really brings the Asparagus to life.
name: Parma Wrapped Asparagus with Mushroom Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g mixed mushrooms, washed, drained and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Wrap 2 spears of asparagus in 1 slice of parma ham. Do this for the whoel batch and transfer to a baking dish with the olive oil.
Fry the diced mushrooms on a non stick pan for 5 minutes or until all the liquid has evaporated.
Allow the mushrooms to cool fully before combining them with the other sauce ingredients and allow to set in the fridge.
Bake your asparaus in the oven for 10 minutes and serve with the mushroom mayonnaise.
